short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web-based event controller allowing you to control events in a meeting room

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
E-board 365 is the perfect choice for a meeting room where the need is to be able to draw, show media or view live sources. Users can simply and easily control various events from a control panel.

E-Board 365 is a web-based media-event processor operating both as a media player and a video mixer for external sources. The user-friendly control interface make it easy to choose what to display on the screen. Each event is programmed with a button that contains a function. E.g. view a video, use the display as an interactive whiteboard or view a live source like an external laptop. External controls commands (TCP/RS 232) are possible with the E-Board 365 IP Server. Typical command event can be turn on/off the monitor, change monitor's input source from HDMI to DVI.

E-Board 365 media player handle image, videos, web pages, IP TV etc. It is also possible to show internal or external media files. E-Board 365 has full support for Multi-Touch with the built-in interactive whiteboard. 

E-Board 365 display supports all types of imaging solutions: single display, edge blend display or multi-display wall. E-Board 365 controls support the most tablets: Android, iPad, W Surface.
